abstract: MobiTV, a company that broadcasts live television over mobile networks, is gearing up for a surge of viewers during the presidential inauguration.
snippet: MobiTV, a company that broadcasts live television over mobile networks, is gearing up for a surge of viewers during the presidential inauguration.
lead_paragraph: Plenty of people are going to want to watch the presidential inauguration on Jan. 20, wherever they happen to be. That makes it a big opportunity for MobiTV, which broadcasts live television across 20 mobile networks, including AT&T, Alltel and Sprint. The company is gearing up for a surge of viewers for its news channels.

headline.main: Gearing Up for Mobile Video on Inauguration Day
